data.eml:eml: A review of the genus Phloeosinopsioides Schedl (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Scolytinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Beaver, Roger A. (2011): A review of the genus Phloeosinopsioides Schedl (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Scolytinae). Zootaxa 3012: 59-63, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.278584
